c297.name: Duplicate of MC-297
c297.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is a {color:#FF5722}*Duplicate*{color} of *MC-297*.

This is known to be a problem with your computer.
-- Update your [graphics card drivers|https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/928493-error-bad-video-card-driver]. (Do not rely on automatic updates)
-- If you are using Java arguments to increase the amount of memory, please reduce it to the default 512MB.
-- If that did not help, please use the *community support* link below.

*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://bugs.mojang.com/projects/MC/summary] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

ccons.name: Wrong project
ccons.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

This is related to a different version of Minecraft. Use one of the links below to go to the correct project.
-- [Minecraft: Java Edition|https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC] --- PC, Mac and Linux
-- [Minecraft: Console Edition|https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCCE] --- Xbox 360, Playstation and Wii U
-- [Minecraft: Bedrock Edition|https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE] --- Android, iOS, Windows 10, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch
-- [Minecraft: Earth|https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCE] --- AR Compatible Devices

*Quick Links*:

cdup.name: Duplicate
cdup.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
We're already tracking this issue at *%s%*, so I will resolve and link this ticket as a duplicate.

If you would like to add a vote and any extra information to the main ticket it would be appreciated.

If you haven't already, you might like to make use of the [*+search feature+*|https://bugs.mojang.com/issues/?jql=project=MC] to see if the issue has already been mentioned.\n\n*Quick Links*:\nðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YmMjqGPmgsA] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

cforce.name: Force debug crash report
cforce.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue has been temporarily closed as {color:#FF5722}*Awaiting Response*{color}.

We do not have enough information to find the cause of this issue.
Please force a crash by pressing *F3 + C* for *10 seconds* while in-game and attach the crash report ({{[minecraft/crash-reports/crash-<DATE>-client.txt|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/guides/finding-minecraft-data-folder]}}) here.

Once attached, the report will be reopened automatically.

*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YmMjqGPmgsA] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

cint.name: Works As Intended
cint.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Working as Intended*{color}.

The report you have submitted is working as intended, mechanics of the game may change between updates.
Things such as graphics, sounds, world creation, biomes, redstone, villagers, and animals may not work the same in current versions.

[Full Version History|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Version_history] -- [Snapshot Version History|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Version_history/Development_versions] -- [Feature Requests and Suggestions|https://www.reddit.com/r/minecraftsuggestions]

cinc.name: Incomplete
cinc.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Incomplete*{color}.

Your report does not contain enough information. As such, we're unable to understand or reproduce the problem.
Please review the guidelines linked below before making further reports.

In case of a game crash, be sure to attach the crashlog from {{[minecraft/crash-reports/crash-<DATE>-client.txt|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/guides/finding-minecraft-data-folder]}}.

cmod.name: Modified game
cmod.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

Your game, launcher or server is modified.
If you can reproduce the issue in a vanilla environment, please recreate the issue.

* Any non-standard client/server/launcher build needs to be taken up with the appropriate team, not Mojang.
* Any plugin issues need to be addressed to the creator of the plugin or resource pack.
* If you have problems on large servers, such as The Hive and Hypixel, please contact them first as they run modified server software.


*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YmMjqGPmgsA] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

cmod.name: Modified game
cmod.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

The server you are playing on is modified.
If you can reproduce the issue in a vanilla environment, please recreate the issue.

* Any non-standard client/server build needs to be taken up with the appropriate team, not Mojang.
* Any plugin issues need to be addressed to the creator of the plugin, add-on or resource pack.
* If you have problems on large servers, such as Mineplex and Lifeboat, please contact them first as they run modified server software.

*Quick Links*:

cout.name: Outdated client
cout.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:red}*Invalid*{color}.

Your Minecraft version is *outdated*. We currently take issues for version *%s%* and the *latest snapshot*.
Please update to the latest version as it includes the newest fixes. If you still have this problem after updating, then please create a new issue.
In case of a game crash, please also attach the [crashlog|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/guides/finding-minecraft-data-folder].

*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YmMjqGPmgsA] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

cpir.name: Pirated Minecraft
cpir.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

You are currently using a *non-authorized* version of Minecraft. If you wish to purchase the full game, please visit the [Minecraft Store|https://minecraft.net/store].
We will not provide support for pirated versions of the game, these versions are modified and may contain malware.


*Quick Links*:

cpir.name: Pirated Minecraft
cpir.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

You are currently using a *non-authorized* version of Minecraft. If you wish to purchase the full game, please visit the [Minecraft Store|https://minecraft.net/store].
We will not provide support for pirated versions of the game, these versions are modified and may contain malware.

ctech.message:

However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

Please contact the *community support*, linked below.

cmult.name: Multiple issues in one report
cmult.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

Please put only one bug report in each ticket. It is very difficult to keep track of bugs when they are not in their own tickets, and it is easier for you to make multiple tickets than for the mods to separate them.

ccrash.name: Attach crash report
ccrash.message:
_We do not have enough information to find the cause of this issue._

Please *attach the crash report* found in {{[minecraft/crash-reports/crash-<DATE>-client.txt|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/guides/finding-minecraft-data-folder]}} here.
If you cannot find a crash report, please attach the *full launcher log* found in {{[minecraft/launcher_log.txt|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/guides/minecraft-logs/]}}.

~This issue has been temporarily closed as {color:#d04437}*Awaiting Response*{color}. Once the requested information has been delivered, the report will be reopened automatically.~

*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YmMjqGPmgsA] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

Your computer does not meet the [minimum system requirements|https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/325948-minecraft-system-requirements] to run Minecraft.

chash.name: Hashtag issue
chash.message: For any new or ongoing hashtag issues, please create a new ticket for any gamertags still affected and use the label {{[chat-filter|https://bugs.mojang.com/issues/?jql=labels+%3D+chat-filter]}}.

cparity.name: Parity issue
cparity.message: Minecraft has several different editions, and some features vary from edition to edition. Often this happens when one edition evolves faster than another, and tweaks or balances are made that don't propagate immediately to other editions.

cparity.name: Parity issue
cparity.message: Minecraft has several different editions, and some features vary from edition to edition. Often this happens when one edition evolves faster than another, and tweaks or balances are made that don't propagate immediately to other editions.

c128302.name: Duplicate of MC-128302
c128302.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is a {color:#FF5722}*Duplicate*{color} of *MC-128302*.

This is known to be a problem with your computer.
-- Update your [graphics card drivers|https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/928493-error-bad-video-card-driver]. (Do not rely on automatic updates)
-- If you are using Java arguments to increase the amount of memory, please reduce it to the default 512MB.
-- If that did not help, please use the *community support* link below.

*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YmMjqGPmgsA] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

cext.name: External server issue
cext.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

Unfortunately we don't accept issues related to External Servers here on the bug tracker, but please add more details if you think this also affects multiplayer over Realms, LAN, or XBL.

I'd suggest contacting the server owner directly or seeking help on the Minecraft forums.

*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YmMjqGPmgsA] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]

noarkit.name: Device not supported
noarkit.message:
*Thank you for your report!*
However, this issue is {color:#FF5722}*Invalid*{color}.

Devices must be ARCore / ARKit compatible to run Minecraft Earth.
Some devices are also currently blacklisted due to issues
A list of compatible and blacklisted devices [can be found here|https://t.co/qSAUjO7lsZ?amp=1].
If you need help or have a suggestion you might like to follow a link below.

*Quick Links*:
ðŸ““ [Issue Guidelines|https://bugs.mojang.com/projects/MC/summary] -- ðŸ’¬ [Community Support|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/technical-support-resources/] -- ðŸ“§ [Customer Support|https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new] -- ðŸ“– [Game Wiki|https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Minecraft_Wiki]
